about_the_game:
Realms of Alterra
Realms of Alterra presents Player-driven AI Playground RPG - an evolutionary step from the Sandbox. RoA fuses GPT-based AI & stunning procedural worlds set in captivating Nordic cyberpunk settings. Cooperate with revolutionary AI, build intricate worlds, take on a constantly evolving journey, and determine your own fate.

Enter the Player-driven AI Playground
Our indie team combined Nordic-inspired landscapes with revolutionary AI technology to offer a first look at our playground RPG. The combination of advanced AI allowed us to step out of the Sandbox and take players to a more mature Playground. So RoA is more than just a game; it is the advanced use of AI that opens up a whole new level of interaction between players and virtual worlds.


Witness, create and play together with us!
This game is not an ordinary game but a live-developing mutual project together with players and developers. Every in-game choice, each story you weave, and each piece of feedback - all influence the further growth of Alterra. It’s a collaborative effort in which your input directly affects the evolution of our AI. While we set the foundation, your experiences and insights pave the way to the future!

Main Features
  • Procedurally generated rich Nordic landscapes
  • AI personalities with their emotions and conversations
  • Independetly interacting AI-NPCs
  • Progressive real-time AI player-prompt adjustments
  • Player-determined course of AI-generated events
  • Innovative combat, cooperation and leadership
  • New level of unscripted immersion
  • AI-driven interactive settlements
  • Inherent dynamic day-night cycles
  • Collaborative game development experience


Your Journey and Your Allies
Choices in Alterra carry more weight than it would seem at first glance. Explore, fight, interact with the environment, and form unique bonds with NPCs. All AI characters not only converse amongst themselves but if you forge strong connections, some might make friends and decide to join your adventure, or become your enemies, intricate and fight against you!

AI NPCs: A Leap into Dynamic Interactions
Our NPCs are designed to do much more than just react. They display their own emotions and engage in conversations. But here's a standout feature that makes our Playground revolutionary: you can adjust AI prompts and instantly witness how they respond not only with words but also with actions. This direct influence on AI behavior is a groundbreaking merger of innovation and gameplay, giving you a truly unique gaming experience. Be keen on diving deeper, share your experiences, braintorm ideas, and join us on our Discord! It's the hub opened for all Realms of Alterra related topics, and a great space to find fellow enthusiasts.


Mutual Future, Side by Side
Realms of Alterra is our starting point, and there's much more on the horizon! As we build, your input is invaluable. We have set up a cutting edge AI-driven Playground. We prepared all the necessary tools, and now we invite you on a mutual journey. Join us, share what you think, and let's create a unique gaming experience together!
"Very few truly original games are produced. We decided to take a step forward and try to define a new revolutionary genre robustly using AI as a foundation. We invite players to join us on an adventure like no other!"
Tomáš Pšenička CEO
